div.div:
While the Thousand Islands Central School District does not have a confirmed case of COVID-19, caused by the novel Coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) in our schools, we are aware of concerns in the community about the spread of this relatively new virus.
The district is closely monitoring this fluid situation and following guidance from the US Centers for Disease Control (CDC), and the New York State Department of Health (NYSDOH), Jefferson County Department of Health and the New York State Education Department.
We will use Parent Square to communicate information on the virus as we receive it and for any updates that impact our school community. .

Inquiries regarding this non-discrimination notice may be directed to Section 504/Title IX Coordinator, Supt. Michael Bashaw, at 315-686-5521
